name: dat-geocoder
description: geocoder transform for dat using carmen + custom data

scripts.preinstall: if [ ! -f mbtiles/alameda-county-addr.mbtiles ]; then mkdir mbtiles; curl -fo mbtiles/alameda-county-addr.mbtiles http://mapbox-carmen.s3.amazonaws.com/other/dat-oakland-soft-story-buildings/alameda-county-addr.mbtiles; fi

author: maxogden
